Report generated: 2025-12-02 23:22:59

======================================================================
Test Case 2 (2D): The 'Standing Wave'
======================================================================

Isotropic diffusion with forcing and homogeneous Neumann BCs.
Exact solution: u = exp(-t) * cos(pi*x)*cos(pi*y)
Forcing: F = (2*pi^2 - 1) * exp(-t) * cos(pi*x)*cos(pi*y)
Time range: t in [0, 2]

======================================================================
SPATIAL CONVERGENCE STUDY
======================================================================
  Grid  11^2: dx = 0.100000, L-inf error = 2.517203e-01, L2 error = 1.041599e-01
  Grid  21^2: dx = 0.050000, L-inf error = 1.234523e-01, L2 error = 4.639837e-02
  Grid  41^2: dx = 0.025000, L-inf error = 6.091954e-02, L2 error = 2.174554e-02
  Grid  81^2: dx = 0.012500, L-inf error = 3.022898e-02, L2 error = 1.050444e-02
  Grid 161^2: dx = 0.006250, L-inf error = 1.504522e-02, L2 error = 5.155685e-03

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Convergence Rates (comparing successive refinements)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
    Grid 1     Grid 2   dx ratio   L-inf rate    L2 rate
----------------------------------------------------------------------
        11^2         21^2       2.00         1.03       1.17
        21^2         41^2       2.00         1.02       1.09
        41^2         81^2       2.00         1.01       1.05
        81^2        161^2       2.00         1.01       1.03
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Expected rate for 2nd-order scheme: ~2.0
